array.description: Interest is paid once at the end of the period
Early withdrawal of funds from the interest account is not possible
The interest account is not replenished
If the promotion is not over yet and the user wants to increase the amount of funds deposited, he should open a new interest account
The number of interest accounts per user is limited to 10
The size of a one-time deposit is not limited
